long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Stop switching apps. Compare AI responses side-by-side with ChatHub!

ChatHub is a powerful browser extension that revolutionizes your AI chatbot experience. With ChatHub, you can simultaneously use multiple AI chatbots, such as ChatGPT/GPT-4o, Gemini, Claude 3.5, Llama, and more, and compare their responses side by side.

## Seamless AI Model Integration

We offer users various ways to access AI models:
1. Use your own account: If you're already logged into services like ChatGPT or Claude in your browser, we automatically utilize them, meaning you can use your own ChatGPT Plus privileges within ChatHub!
2. Use your own API key: We've integrated official APIs from various services, allowing you to use them with your API key on a pay-as-you-go basis, ensuring stability and reliability.
3. Use our AI service: We provide ready-to-use AI services, giving you access to over 20 AI models with a simple subscription to ChatHub.

## Key Features

In addition to these, ChatHub offers:
1. Prompt library: Manage and discover commonly used prompts.
2. Local chat history: Save your chat history locally and perform full-text searches.
3. Markdown support and code highlighting for enhanced readability.
4. Dark mode for comfortable viewing in low-light environments.
5. Smart web access: Improve chatbot responses by incorporating up-to-date information from the internet.
6. Custom chatbots: Integrate any OpenAI-compatible API to create your own chatbots.
7. Quick access within your browser using keyboard shortcuts.

Experience the future of AI chatbot interaction with ChatHub. Install the extension now and unlock a world of powerful AI conversations at your fingertips.
long.de,fr:
ChatHub is an all-in-one chatbot client

Features:
* Use different chatbots in one app, currently supporting ChatGPT and new Bing Chat, and will integrate Google Bard and more in the future.
* Chat with multiple chatbots at the same time, making it easy to compare their answers.
* Support ChatGPT API mode, which is faster and more cost-effective than ChatGPT Plus.
* Support GPT-4
* Token usage stats when using ChatGPT API mode.
* Prompt Library
* Shortcut to quickly activate the app anywhere in the browser.
* Markdown and code highlight support.

Source code: https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub
long.es:
ChatHub es un cliente de chatbot todo en uno.

Características:
* Utiliza ChatGPT, Google Gemini, Claude 3, Bing Chat, Perplexity y más de 10 modelos de lenguaje grandes de código abierto.
* Chatea con múltiples chatbots al mismo tiempo, facilitando la comparación de sus respuestas.
* Compatible con GPT-4, la API de ChatGPT y el servicio Azure OpenAI.
* Soporte de entrada visual para Bing y Bard.
* Gestiona las indicaciones con la Biblioteca de Indicaciones.
* Atajo para activar rápidamente la aplicación en cualquier parte del navegador.
* Soporte para Markdown y resaltado de código.

Código fuente: https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub

-----Preguntas frecuentes:-----

1. ¿Qué es ChatHub?
ChatHub es una extensión del navegador que te permite utilizar múltiples chatbots simultáneamente.

2. ¿Qué chatbots admite ChatHub?
Actualmente, ChatHub admite ChatGPT, Bing, Google Bard, Claude y más de 10 chatbots de código abierto.

3. ¿Es ChatHub de código abierto?
Sí, ChatHub es de código abierto. Puedes encontrar el código fuente en GitHub.

4. ¿Qué navegadores admite ChatHub?
ChatHub funciona en todos los navegadores basados en Chromium, incluyendo Chrome, Edge, Brave, etc.

5. ¿Es ChatHub gratuito?
Sí, la mayoría de las funciones de ChatHub son gratuitas de usar, y también tenemos un plan premium.

6. ¿Qué es ChatHub Premium?
ChatHub Premium es un plan de pago que desbloquea todas las características premium de ChatHub.
long.ja:
ChatHubは、AIチャットボットの体験を革新する強力なブラウザ拡張機能です。ChatHubを使用すると、ChatGPT/GPT-4o、Gemini、Claude 3.5、Llamaなど、複数のAIチャットボットを同時に使用し、その回答を並べて比較することができます。

# シームレスなAIモデル統合

ユーザーにAIモデルにアクセスする様々な方法を提供しています：
1. 自分のアカウントを使用：ブラウザでChatGPTやClaudeなどのサービスにすでにログインしている場合、自動的にそれらを利用します。つまり、ChatHub内でChatGPT Plusの特権を使用できます！
2. 自分のAPIキーを使用：様々なサービスの公式APIを統合しており、APIキーを使用して従量制で利用できます。安定性と信頼性を確保します。
3. 当社のAIサービスを使用：すぐに使用できるAIサービスを提供し、ChatHubの簡単な購読で20以上のAIモデルにアクセスできます。

# 主な機能

これらに加えて、ChatHubは以下の機能を提供します：
1. プロンプトライブラリ：よく使用するプロンプトを管理および発見します。
2. ローカルチャット履歴：チャット履歴をローカルに保存し、全文検索を実行します。
3. 読みやすさを向上させるMarkdownサポートとコードハイライト。
4. 低光量環境での快適な閲覧のためのダークモード。
5. スマートウェブアクセス：インターネットから最新の情報を取り入れ、チャットボットの応答を改善します。
6. カスタムチャットボット：OpenAI互換のAPIを統合して、独自のチャットボットを作成します。
7. キーボードショートカットを使用してブラウザ内で素早くアクセス。

ChatHubでAIチャットボットの対話の未来を体験してください。今すぐ拡張機能をインストールし、指先で強力なAI会話の世界を解き放ちましょう。
long.ko:
ChatHub is an all-in-one AI chatbot client.

Features:
* Use ChatGPT, Google Gemini, Claude 3, Bing Chat, Perplexity, and open-source large language models.
* Chat with multiple chatbots at the same time, making it easy to compare their answers.
* Support GPT-4, ChatGPT API, Azure OpenAI service.
* Support image input for ChatGPT, Bing and Gemini.
* Manage prompts with Prompt Library.
* Shortcut to quickly activate the app anywhere in the browser.
* Full-text search for chat history.
* Markdown and code highlight support.
* Beautiful dark mode.
* 🆕 Smart web access: improving chatbots by searching up-to-date information from the internet.
* 🆕 Add any chat model to ChatHub with OpenAI-compatible API.

With ChatHub, you can accomplish things like:
* Find out what is the best chatbot.
* Chatbot comparison with dual, threefold, fourfold and more layout.
* ChatGPT vs Google Gemini vs Bing vs Claude 3 etc.
* Chat with LLama 2 and other open-source LLM models for free.

-----FAQ:-----

1. What is ChatHub?
ChatHub is a Chrome extension that makes you use multiple chatbots at the same time.

2. What chatbots does ChatHub support?
ChatHub currently supports ChatGPT, Bing, Google Bard, Claude and 10+ open-source chatbots.

3. Is ChatHub open-source?
Yes, ChatHub is open-source, you can find the source code on GitHub.

4. What browsers does ChatHub support?
ChatHub works on all Chromium-based browsers, including Chrome, Edge, Brave etc.

5. Is ChatHub free?
Yes, most features of ChatHub is free to use, and we also have a premium plan.

6. What is ChatHub Premium?
ChatHub Premium is a paid plan that unlocks all premium features of ChatHub.
long.pt_BR:
ChatHub é um cliente de chatbot tudo-em-um.

Recursos:
* Use o ChatGPT, Bing Chat, Google Bard, Claude 2 e mais de 10 grandes modelos de linguagem de código aberto.
* Converse com vários chatbots ao mesmo tempo, facilitando a comparação de suas respostas.
* Suporte para GPT-4, API do ChatGPT, serviço Azure OpenAI.
* Suporte para entrada visual no Bing e Bard.
* Gerencie prompts com a Biblioteca de Prompts.
* Atalho para ativar rapidamente o aplicativo em qualquer lugar do navegador.
* Suporte a Markdown e destaque de código.

Código-fonte: https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub

-----Perguntas Frequentes:-----

1. O que é o ChatHub?
O ChatHub é uma extensão para navegador que permite usar vários chatbots simultaneamente.

2. Quais chatbots o ChatHub suporta?
Atualmente, o ChatHub suporta o ChatGPT, Bing, Google Bard, Claude e mais de 10 chatbots de código aberto.

3. O ChatHub é de código aberto?
Sim, o ChatHub é de código aberto. Você pode encontrar o código-fonte no GitHub.

4. Quais navegadores o ChatHub suporta?
O ChatHub funciona em todos os navegadores baseados em Chromium, incluindo Chrome, Edge, Brave, etc.

5. O ChatHub é gratuito?
Sim, a maioria dos recursos do ChatHub é gratuita para usar, e também temos um plano premium.

6. O que é o ChatHub Premium?
O ChatHub Premium é um plano pago que desbloqueia todos os recursos premium do ChatHub.
